Preterit.turoyo: l-u=muxtarmatrakle i=muxtariye w-azzeyolə=qriṯo, išmaŠtrakoko-boxenoʕal i=dukṯo d-matarko-lan, i=walaye d-baban
translations: ‘I am crying about the place we left, the town of our father’ 73/202;

Infectum.turoyo: ono d-moyadnoak=kallawat-ani <…> w-d-əbʕed-matrakno i=baqoruṯo; 144; 47/7; U aġaməllelelumuxtaromər: "Liʔanno ono hawinoaġauʕdoḥaṯo, koʕoyaqluxmeniʕalhawxa, kəbʕatmatərkat i muxtariye."
translations: I take this money, I will have to abandon pasturing the
